rule.name: Spelling Check for Common Words
rule.message: Check the spelling of this word.
rule.example: The word familia should be spelled "pamilya".

rule.name: Use of Additional Letters
rule.message: Ensure proper usage of additional letters (c, f, j, ñ, q, v, x, z).
rule.example: The word telefone should use the correct additional letters.

rule.name: Correct Use of Native Words
rule.message: Check the spelling of this native word.
rule.example: The word pakibagayan should be spelled correctly.

rule.name: Use of Diacritics in Words
rule.message: Ensure proper use of diacritics in words.
rule.example: The word pámahalaan should use diacritics correctly.

rule.name: Proper Nouns Capitalization
rule.message: Ensure proper capitalization of proper nouns.
rule.example: The name manila should be capitalized as "Manila".

rule.name: Proper Use of Hyphens
rule.message: Use hyphens correctly in compound words.
rule.example: The word araw-araw should use hyphens correctly.

rule.name: Correct Use of Punctuation
rule.message: Use punctuation marks correctly.
rule.example: Ensure proper punctuation: ,

rule.name: Use of Diacritics
rule.message: Ensure the correct use of diacritics.
rule.example: Check the diacritics in malígaya.

rule.name: Correct Use of Ellipsis
rule.message: Use ellipsis correctly, with exactly three dots.
rule.example: The ellipsis .... should be replaced with "…".

rule.name: Comma Use in List
rule.message: Do not use a comma before "at" in a list.
rule.example: The list should be apple, orange, at banana.

rule.name: Syllabication Rules
rule.message: Ensure correct syllabication.
rule.example: The word totoo should be syllabicated as "to.to.o".

rule.name: Repetition of Syllables
rule.message: Check the repetition of syllables in this word.
rule.example: The word halo-halo should be checked for syllable repetition.

rule.name: Syllabication with Affixes
rule.message: Ensure proper syllabication with affixes.
rule.example: The word pakikitungo should be syllabicated correctly.

rule.name: Splitting Words at Line Endings
rule.message: Ensure correct splitting of words at line endings.
rule.example: The word pag-aaral should be split correctly.

rule.name: Hyphenated Words at Line Endings
rule.message: Check the correct use of hyphens at line endings.
rule.example: The word batá-batá should use hyphens correctly.

rule.name: Borrowing Foreign Words
rule.message: Ensure proper spelling of borrowed words.
rule.example: The word television should be borrowed correctly.

rule.name: Technical and Scientific Terms
rule.message: Keep the original spelling for technical and scientific terms.
rule.example: The term photosynthesis should retain its original spelling.

rule.name: Proper Nouns
rule.message: Keep the original spelling for proper nouns.
rule.example: The name Shakespeare should be spelled correctly.

rule.name: Spelling of Borrowed Terms
rule.message: Ensure correct spelling of borrowed terms.
rule.example: The borrowed term computer should be spelled correctly.

rule.name: Proper Use of Foreign Plurals
rule.message: Ensure proper use of foreign plurals.
rule.example: The plural form computers should be used correctly.

rule.name: Repeating Syllables in Root Words
rule.message: Check the repetition of syllables in root words.
rule.example: The word gabi-gabi should be checked for syllable repetition.

rule.name: Repeating Syllables with Affixes
rule.message: Ensure proper repetition of syllables with affixes.

rule.name: Repeating Syllables in Compound Words

rule.name: Repeating Syllables in Reduplicated Words
rule.message: Ensure correct repetition in reduplicated words.

rule.name: Repetition in Affixed Words
rule.message: Check repetition in words with affixes.

rule.name: Proper Use of Hyphens in Repeated Words
rule.message: Use hyphens correctly in repeated words.
rule.example: The word gabi-gabi should use hyphens correctly.

rule.name: Hyphens in Compound Adjectives
rule.message: Ensure correct use of hyphens in compound adjectives.

rule.name: Hyphens in Prefixes

rule.name: Hyphens in Compound Nouns
rule.message: Ensure correct use of hyphens in compound nouns.
rule.example: The compound noun kotse-bahay should use hyphens correctly.

rule.name: Hyphens in Numbers
rule.message: Check the use of hyphens in written numbers.
rule.example: The number dalawampu't-isa should use hyphens correctly.

rule.name: Use of Periods
rule.message: Ensure the correct use of periods at the end of sentences.
rule.example: The sentence Mag-aral ka should end with a period.

rule.name: Use of Commas

rule.name: Use of Exclamation Marks
rule.message: Ensure the correct use of exclamation marks.

rule.name: Use of Question Marks
rule.message: Ensure the correct use of question marks.
rule.example: The question Ano ito? should use a question mark.

rule.name: Use of Quotation Marks
rule.message: Ensure the correct use of quotation marks for direct speech.
rule.example: The sentence "Ako ay mag-aaral," should use quotation marks correctly.

rule.name: Correct Use of Plurals
rule.message: Ensure correct use of plural forms.
rule.example: The plural form mga tao should be used correctly.

rule.name: Correct Use of Verb Tenses
rule.message: Ensure correct use of verb tenses.
rule.example: The verb kumain should be in the correct tense.

rule.name: Proper Sentence Structure
rule.message: Ensure proper sentence structure.
rule.example: The sentence Siya ay maganda should have correct structure.

rule.name: Use of Connectors
rule.message: Ensure the correct use of connectors.
rule.example: The sentence at saka should use connectors correctly.

rule.name: Agreement of Subject and Predicate
rule.message: Ensure the subject and predicate agree.
rule.example: The sentence Si Ana ay nagtuturo should have agreement.
